alert.note: Alert for South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 11:27PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN AITKIN COUNTY THROUGH MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, or 21 miles east of Mille Lacs Lake, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lawler, Ronald, and Dads Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
